author: Staff Reporter
text:
Vasuki Subramaniam, SVS college administrator, was produced before a Judicial Magistrate court in Kallakurichi on Thursday. The court remanded her to custody in the Cuddalore Central Prison and directed the police to produce her before the court on Friday.

Also, the body of Monisha, one of the three students of SVS college of Naturopathy and Yoga Science who was found dead in a well on Saturday last was handed over to her father M.K. Tamilarasan for re-post-mortem in Chennai on Thursday.

A team at the Government Medical College and Hospital at Mundiyambakkam handed over the girl’s body which was kept in the mortuary to Mr.Tamilarasan and his advocate at 10.50 a.m.

Talking to reporters, Mr. Tamilarasan demanded a thorough probe into the death of the three girls and alleged that the police and the District Collector were acting in favour of the college management.

Monisha’s father Tamilarasan demanded a thorough probe into the death of 3 girls
title: SVS administrator produced before magistrate
